name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
overview: Destroy the shape-changing, body-slicing liquid metal T-1000! You are a T-800 terminator: living tissue over metal endoskeleton programmed to protect John Connor and prevent Judgement Day. Battle bad-to-the bone bikers! Rescue Sarah! Destroy Cyberdyne Laboratories! Terminate the T-1000 in the ultimate metal-wrenching steel mill battle of the machines!
